vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Βαρσαββᾶς (Rec. -αβᾶς), -ᾶ (Aram., son of Sabba),
Barsabbas:
__1. the surname of one Joseph: Act.1:23.
__2. The surname of one Judas: Act.15:22.
† (From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.shortDef: Barsabbas, "son of the Sabbath" or "son of Saba"
vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.1.23; also called Barsabbas (KJV: Barsabas) at Act.1.23; Justus at Act.1.23;
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴撒巴 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在亞蘭文的意思是 "撒巴的兒子"
1) 一個名叫約瑟的人的姓氏 (徒 1:23)
2) 一個名叫猶大的人的姓氏 (徒 15:22)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
巴撒巴这个阳性专有名词人名在亚兰文的意思是"撒巴的儿子"
1) 一个名叫约瑟的人的姓氏(徒1:23)
2) 一个名叫犹大的人的姓氏(徒15:22)
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Ba-sa-ba được gọi là Giô-sép. « con trai của Sa-bát hoặc con trai của Saba ». Xem H1247 (con) và H6634.

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.15.22; also called Barsabbas (KJV: Barsabas) at Act.15.22;
